fullText: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd make for an oddly touching pair as George and Lennie in this solid revival of John Steinbeck's Depression-era tale.
dtliExcerpt: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd make for an oddly touching pair as George and Lennie in this solid revival of John Steinbeck's Depression-era tale.
bwwExcerpt: There may be no more strikingly different debuts than the ones James Franco and Chris O'Dowd are making in 'Of Mice and Men.' As George, the wandering ranch hand in John Steinbeck's hard-luck 1930s California, Franco is all surface, never giving us any insight into what drives him - he's a very handsome blank.
showScoreExcerpt: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd make for an oddly touching pair as George and Lennie in this solid revival of John Steinbeck's Depression-era tale.
